mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, password, phone, birth, created_at, updated_at FROM tb_user ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user (name, email, password, phone, birth, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{birth}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, phone = #{phone}, birth = #{birth}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
